how_to_title: How to convert PDF to Text Online for Free
how_to_step_four: Click on the 'Download' button to download the PDF file(s).
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF documents(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_three: Click on the 'Convert to TXT' button to start the conversion.
how_to_step_two: Add more files or delete files if necessary.
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to convert PDF To TXT files.
feature_four_text: Working with PDF To TXT is absolutely secure. Files are deleted permanently after one hour.
feature_one_text: Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities, this tool is able to convert PDF To TXT file in a shorter amount of time.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the PDF To TXT Tool online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: This tool enables you to add more files or delete files and to convert multiple TXT documents at same time.
feature_two_text: You can use this PDF To TXT tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to convert PDF To TXT files.
page_header_text: Convert your TXT document to high-quality PDF with ease using our online PDF To TXT converter tool.
